title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2586/94 of 25 October 1994 fixing the intervention price for olive oil for the 1994/95 marketing year at a reduced level to take account of the overrun of the maximum guaranteed quantity during the 1992/93 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2586/94 of 25 October 1994 fixing the intervention price for olive oil for the 1994/95 marketing year at a reduced level to take account of the overrun of the maximum guaranteed quantity during the 1992/93 marketing  year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The intervention price for olive oil for the 1994/95 marketing year shall be ECU 158,94/100 kg.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 November 1994.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 October 1994.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 172, 30. 9. 1966, p. 3025/66.
(2) OJ No L 285, 20. 11. 1993, p. 9.
(3) OJ No L 197, 30. 7. 1994, p. 14.
